title: 网页后台报错我不懂！求解决！
author: z173817010
txt_content:
服务器是1.7.10的
15.01 00:21:51 [Server] WARN The server is going slow. Last server tick was 47825ms ago15.01 00:21:51 [Server] WARN Last Tick: 1484410855899 Current Time: 1484410888364 Warning: 30000 Timeout: 9000015.01 00:21:51 [Server] WARN [TPS]: 20.0 Server Tick #3516615.01 00:21:53 [Server] WARN Dimension:015.01 00:21:56 [Server] WARN Loaded Chunks: 280 Active Chunks: 0 Entities: 168 Tile Entities: 7515.01 00:22:23 [Server] WARN Entities Last Tick: 11915.01 00:22:58 [Server] WARN Tiles Last Tick: 015.01 00:23:28 [Server] WARN Dimension:-1915.01 00:24:03 [Server] WARN Loaded Chunks: 0 Active Chunks: 0 Entities: 0 Tile Entities: 015.01 00:24:42 [Server] WARN Entities Last Tick: 0
上面是后台报错的
然后服务器就刷新不出来了
一直是加载状态


这是怎么回事

replies.txt_content: 上次我也这样了，你租的哪个服务商，上次我是麦某科技，据说是他们DNS出问题了……晚上就好了

重启服务器了  .  一会有这样可 ，怎么搞？
